text: Sursk (, 53°05'N 45°42'E) is town in Penza Oblast, Russia. Its population is near 7,500 (2005). The town was founded in 1860. Sursk is located on the Sura River's left bank. It is 92 km from Penza. == Other websites == * Site about Sursk Category:1860 establishments Category:19th-century establishments in Russia Category:Cities and towns in Penza Oblast
title: Sursk
